description.author: The Accelerate Team
description.description:
This package demonstrates a number of computation kernels and applications
showcasing the /Accelerate/ language and associated backend implementations.
It is also used for performance and regression testing.

Refer to the main /Accelerate/ package for more information:
<http://hackage.haskell.org/package/accelerate>

package-flags.name: gui
package-flags.description:
Enable gloss-based GUIs, where applicable. If not
enabled, the application always runs in benchmark mode.

package-flags.name: ekg
package-flags.description: Enable EKG remote monitoring server at <http://localhost:8000>

package-flags.name: cuda
package-flags.description: Enable the CUDA parallel backend for NVIDIA GPUs

package-flags.name: llvm-cpu
package-flags.description: Enable the LLVM backend for multicore CPUs

package-flags.name: llvm-gpu
package-flags.description: Enable the LLVM backend for NVIDIA CPUs

package-flags.name: crystal
package-flags.description: A visualisation of a sum of waves in a plane

package-flags.name: nbody
package-flags.description: Simulation of gravitational attraction between solid particles

package-flags.name: hashcat
package-flags.description: A "password recovery" application for MD5 cracking

package-flags.name: kmeans
package-flags.description: An implementation of k-means clustering in a plane
